title: It's a dangerous world
brief_description: An informational film promoting the benefits of undertaking a first aid course by alerting viewers to a myriad of domestic hazards. Shows the attitude of an ordinary person to accidents in all fields. The extent of deaths and injuries from accidents; how various types of accidents happen.
